creator: icui@email.it
text: -- Tested on linux system kernel 2.4, 2.6 with php 4.3.4/4.3.9 and php 5.0.1 -- Run following two pages in your system and see apache log file. --------------- filename content --------------- ---------------------------------------- page.htm ---------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------- page.php ---------------------------------------- htm extension: page run properly, once. log: 192.168.1.2 - - [17/Nov/2004:00:44:17 +0100] "GET /bug/page.htm HTTP/1.1" 200 41 php extension: page run twice. log: 192.168.1.2 - - [17/Nov/2004:00:44:27 +0100] "GET /bug/page.php HTTP/1.1" 200 41 192.168.1.2 - - [17/Nov/2004:00:44:27 +0100] "GET /bug/page.php HTTP/1.1" 200 41 I'm not sure that it's a php bug, apache bug or nothing of all that. Thanks for your interest!

creator: trawick@apache.org
text:
Please ask for help on a user support list.  Browser is asking for page twice,
so it appears twice in access log.

http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users
